title: Add GenerateDocumentationFile to the xsd
body: The property `DocumentationFile` is in the xsd but `GenerateDocumentationFile` is not, making it hard to discover. Since this is the property set by project.json>csproj migration, it should at least show up in IntelliSense.

nodes.body: Reopening because these XSDs require manual sync to an internal repo for localization 😢.
Manual sync was done by @AndyGerlicher in [an internal PR](https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_git/VS/pullrequest/100205). Should be available in the next preview release of VS 15.6.
This still isn't showing up in IntelliSense with VS 15.9.1
